name: Laundry Theft
description:
Laundry theft is a 2-player versus game in which the player who steals the most laundry wins.

Controls: AD and left/right arrow keys

This is my 1st game made by GDevelop.

Scores and special abilities:

Bra - 100 points during the glide

Underwear - Gives the other player a ton of points and makes them unable to move

Sock- 1point - might take several tries to collect(10 point on 1st try)

Jeans - 1 point + jump

Shirt - 1 point for each laundry collected before looping 

*Scores were made in a rush, so plese let me know if something is off.

Assets used for players are made  by https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/
